title: Debian Systems Now Patched Against “Downfall” and “INCEPTION” CPU Flaws
description:
Debian Bookworm and Bullseye users are now patched against the recent "Downfall" and "INCEPTION" hardware flaws affecting Intel and AMD CPUs.

The post Debian Systems Now Patched Against “Downfall” and “INCEPTION” CPU Flaws appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
